# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. This product is worth more than $150 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Considering its quality and benefits, I would like to offer it to you for $200. I believe this price reflects the true value of what we're providing and I'm confident it will meet or exceed your expectations. Thank you for considering this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
